message.body: How late is it safe to walk alone around where we live?
I wouldn't walk alone after 10 but until then there should be enough people milling around to be safe
Also remember to drop your check off today!!
Also, unless you already own these, I'm gonna go ahead and order a microwave and a toaster oven because I have gift money on amazon and I can be there this week when they are delivered. Cool?
Sounds perf. Let me know how much you want me to throw in!
Thanks so much for dealing with all of this
You're welcome! It is all on gift money so I don't want anything. I will just keep them at the end.
Quick question: Where do you get your septa tokens?
I usually just get them at 15th and market near my work but you can buy them at the 46th street el stop near our house during business hours
Just a heads up they are changing our locks so your key wont work anymore
That is the most annoying. Thanks for the heads up though!
On the bright side we have Internet so that's good :)
Yay! Love Internet. Are they giving you my key also?
It looks like a real kitchen! Also I have an electric kettle I will bring
First night of sips tonight. Get excited and get ready to get your reduced rate drank on! Back by popular demand, it will be top of the tower at 1717 arch, 50th floor at 5:30
